params._agent: Agent address to check accrued restaker interest for
params._asset: Asset to check accrued restaker interest for

returns.accruedInterest: Accrued restaker interest in asset decimals

returns.health: Health status of an agent, encoded in ray (1e27)
returns.liquidationThreshold: Liquidation ratio of an agent, encoded in ray (1e27)
returns.ltv: Loan to value ratio, encoded in ray (1e27)
returns.totalDebt: Total debt of an agent in USD, encoded with 8 decimals
returns.totalDelegation: Total delegation of an agent in USD, encoded with 8 decimals
returns.totalSlashableCollateral: Total slashable collateral of an agent in USD, encoded with 8 decimals

returns.maxBonus: Maximum bonus in percentage ray decimals

returns.bonusCap: Bonus cap in percentage ray decimals

params._agent: Agent address to check debt for

returns.totalDebt: Total debt amount in asset decimals

params._emergencyLiquidationThreshold: Liquidation threshold below which grace periods are voided
params._expiry: Expiry period after which an agent cannot be liquidated until called again
params._grace: Grace period before an agent becomes liquidatable

params._amount: Amount of asset to repay on behalf of the agent
params.liquidatedValue: Value of the liquidation returned to the liquidator

returns.maxBorrowableAmount: Maximum amount that can be borrowed in asset decimals

returns.maxLiquidatableAmount: Maximum amount that can be liquidated in asset decimals

params._asset: Asset to calculate max realization for

returns._maxRealization: Maximum interest that can be realized

params._agent: Agent to calculate max realization for
params._asset: Asset to calculate max realization for

returns.newRealizedInterest: Maximum interest that can be realized
returns.newUnrealizedInterest: Unrealized interest that will be added to the debt

params._pause: True if pausing or false if unpausing

params._agent: Repay on behalf of another borrower

returns.paused: True if the asset is paused, false otherwise

params._bonusCap: Bonus cap in percentage ray decimals

params._minBorrow: Minimum borrow amount in asset decimals

unrealizedInterest(address,address).details: This amount was not yet realized due to low reserves for the asset

params._asset: Asset to check unrealized interest for

accruedRestakerInterest(address,address).notice: Get the accrued restaker interest for an agent for a specific asset

addAsset((address,address,address,addres.notice: Add an asset to the Lender

bonus(address).notice: Calculate the maximum bonus for a liquidation in percentage ray decimals

closeLiquidation(address).notice: Close liquidation window of an agent when the health is above 1

debt(address,address).notice: Get the current debt balances for an agent for a specific asset

liquidate(address,address,uint256).notice: Liquidate an agent when the health is below 1

liquidationStart(address).notice: The liquidation start time for an agent

maxBorrowable(address,address).notice: Calculate the maximum amount that can be borrowed for a given asset

maxLiquidatable(address,address).notice: Calculate the maximum amount that can be liquidated for a given asset

maxRealization(address).notice: Calculate the maximum interest that can be realized

maxRestakerRealization(address,address).notice: Calculate the maximum interest that can be realized for a restaker

openLiquidation(address).notice: Open liquidation window of an agent when the health is below 1

pauseAsset(address,bool).notice: Pause an asset from being borrowed

realizeRestakerInterest(address,address).notice: Realize interest for restaker debt of an agent for an asset

removeAsset(address).notice: Remove asset from lending when there is no borrows

reservesCount().notice: Get the total number of reserves

reservesData(address).notice: The reserve data for an asset

setMinBorrow(address,uint256).notice: Set the minimum borrow amount for an asset

unrealizedInterest(address,address).notice: Get the unrealized restaker interest for an agent for a specific asset
